item.title: Beetlejuice 3 Can Finally Answer Two 37-Year-Old Questions About Michael Keaton's Character
item.description: Beetlejuice 3 will be an exciting completion of the Tim Burton trilogy, and it has the opportunity to answer some key Betelguese lore questions.

item.title: I Need Encanto 2 To Fix A Massive Bruno Injustice From Disney's 2021 Movie
item.description: Despite We Don't Talk About Bruno being the smash hit of Encanto, Bruno himself never gets a solo song, a missed opportunity Encanto 2 could rectify.
